Dantemon.description: Dantemon resembles a humanoid robot. It has glowing colored spheres on its shoulders, hands, knees.  chest and head and green hair.

debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Cyber Arena
Denpamon.description: Denpamon is a small Appmon with a loudspeaker on top of its head. Like most Appmon, it has two cables to allowApplinkthough they're on the sides of it head and are used like arms.

attacks.name: Initial Zero
attacks.description: Builds energy with its hands, then launches an orb-shaped energy field that disintegrates anything in its radius.

attacks.name: Code

Dezipmon.name: Dezipmon
debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Cyber Arena

attacks.name: Absorb Zip
attacks.description: Opens the zipper in its body and absorbs its target's data.

attacks.name: Unfreeze Fist
attacks.description: Runs towards the enemy to deliver a punch.

Diarimon.name: Diarimon
debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Cyber Arena
Diarimon.description: Diarimon appears as andiarywith an eye looking out of the keyhole of its lock. Its arms arefountain pens, and it wears a key around its neck. Like most Appmon, it has two cables on its back to allowApplink.

Dicemon.name: Dicemon
debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Cyber Arena
Dicemon.description: Dicemon is a die with a single eye on the onepipface. Like most Appmon, it has two cables on its back to allowApplink.

Docmon.name: Docmon
debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Cyber Arena

attacks.name: Spiral Trigger
attacks.description: Launches the liquids from its syringes, forming a spiral with them.

DoGatchmon.name: DoGatchmon
debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters (manga),
"Protagonist Launch" [01]
DoGatchmon.description: DoGatchmon is a Super Search Appmon.

attacks.name: Deep Dive
attacks.description: Warps the pointers to create a portal into the Net Ocean, and dives in to look for the result of a search.

attacks.name: DoGatch Buster
attacks.description: Warps the pointers to its hands, then fires a powerful blast of energy.

attacks.name: Sonic Slash
attacks.description: Combines two of its pointers into a sword, and slashes at the opponent.

Dokamon.name: Dokamon

attacks.name: Doka-Doka Rush
attacks.description: Surrounds itself with an aura and flies towards the opponent like a meteor while punching them multiple times.

attacks.name: Big Bang Punch (Dokkan Punch)
attacks.description: Flies towards the enemy while surrounding itself with comet-like energy, then delivers a punch.

Dopemon.name: Dopemon
debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Cyber Arena

Dosukomon.name: Dosukomon
debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Cyber Arena

attacks.name: Jet Palm Slap (ジェット張手, Jetto Harite, lit. "Jet Speed Slap")
attacks.description: Uses its thrusters to fly to the enemy at high speeds, then hits them with the palm of its gauntlets.

attacks.name: Jet Headbutt
attacks.description: Flies towards the enemy at high speeds, then delivers a headbutt.

Dogamon.name: Dogamon
debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Cyber Arena

Ecomon.name: Ecomon
debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Cyber Arena
Ecomon.description: Ecomon is essentially a humanoidbatterywith a plant growing out of its head. However, it is heavily covered in knight-like armor. It also occupies bulky arms, a spiked toe on each foot, and a v-neck design on the torso, referencing volts. Like most Appmon, it has two cables on its back to allowApplink.

Effecmon.name: Effecmon
debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Cyber Arena

Entermon.power: 42000 in Appli Drive63000 in Appli Drive DUO

attacks.description: Draws the enemy's attention by asking them if they are ready.

attacks.name: Porte Melos (Fra: "Melos Staves")

Fakemon.name: Fakemon
debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Cyber Arena

Flickmon.name: Flickmon
debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Cyber Arena
Flickmon.description: Flickmon appears to have a round body with a face. It has four pointed feet with no legs. It has a design depicting four small squares surrounding a large square on its forehead. It has two floppy ears on either side of its head. Its color depends on its type.

Gaiamon.name: Gaiamon
debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters (3DS)

attacks.name: Ultimate Adamas

attacks.description: Scans up to the entire planet in search of any foes running loose.

attacks.name: Glanz Gazer (Deu: "Shining Gazer")

attacks.name: Schwert Cutter (Deu: "Sword Cutter")
attacks.description: Cuts open the target with the blades mounted on his wrist.

Gomimon.name: Gomimon
debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Cyber Arena

debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Cyber Arena

attacks.name: Vanquish Claw
attacks.description: Enlarges its right claw which then sprouts robotic hands that extend to grab and attack any foe. This attack is capable of breaking up Applinks.

Hadesmon.name: Hadesmon
debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters (3DS)

attacks.name: Melan-Explode (μέλαν-Explode lit. "Black-Explode")
attacks.description: Gathers energy in the form of a massive ball, and throws it underneath the enemy, causing a giant bolt of lightning to appear, and attack the enemy. This attack can also break through the surface web.

attacks.name: Hell Kakia (Hell κακία lit. "Hell Malice")
attacks.description: Sinks its tail into the ground to create cracks that fold an entire dimension on top of the enemy.

Jammingmon.name: Jammingmon
debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Cyber Arena
Jammingmon.description: Jammingmon is a small Appmon with a loudspeaker on top of its head. Like most Appmon, it has two cables to allowApplinkthough they're on the sides of it head and are used like arms.

Jetmon.name: Jetmon
debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Cyber Arena
Jetmon.description: Jetmon appears to be a cross between aPteranodonand anairplane. It has claws at the tips of its wings which hold missiles. Jetmon appears to be an Appmon version ofPteramon. Like most Appmon, it has two cables on its back to allowApplink.

Jishomon.name: Jishomon
debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Cyber Arena
Jishomon.description: Jishomon's design is an open dictionary with eyes and a bookmark. It has a foil band across the cover resembling a pair of glasses. Like most Appmon, it has two cables to allowApplinkthough they're on the sides and are used like arms.

JumpPlusmon.name: JumpPlusmon
debut: None

Kaimon.name: Kaimon
Kaimon.description: Kaimon appears to be a white Appmon with a bluecoin pursefor a body, ayen signon its face, and wears a white apron just likeKakeimon. Its appearance like that of a housewife is possibly due to the stereotype that the housewife performs the shopping. Like most Appmon, it has two cables on its back to allowApplink.

Kakeimon.name: Kakeimon
Kakeimon.description: Kakeimon appears to be a black Appmon with a pinkcoin pursefor a body, a pink heart on its face, and wears a white apron. Its appearance like that of a housewife is possibly due to the Japanese stereotype that the housewife controls the household finances. Like most Appmon, it has two cables on its back to allowApplink.

Kosomon.name: Kosomon
Kosomon.description: Kosomon is a Gossip Review Appmon.

Libramon.name: Libramon
Libramon.description: Libramon appears to be aprofessorwith a bookshelf filled with books for a head. Like most Appmon, it has two cables on its back to allowApplink.

Logimon.name: Logimon
Logimon.description: Logimon is a Login Appmon. It is an Appmon that digivolved from Onmon.

attacks.description: "Circular Tornado")

Logomon.name: Logomon

Luckmon.name: Luckmon
Luckmon.description: Luckmon appears to be aslot machinewith its eyes and nose on the slots. Instead of arms, it has two slot machine levers to act as such. Like most Appmon, it has two cables on its back to allowApplink.

MCmon.name: MCmon
MCmon.description: MCmon is a Live Commentary Appmon.

attacks.name: Jikkyō Crisis (ジッキョークライシス, Jikkyō Crisis lit. "Live Crisis")
VirtualVerse
attacks.description: Generates a giant warship from out of nowhere, then uses its ion gun to attack the opponent.

attacks.name: Howling Blast
attacks.description: Fires a supersonic pulse from its speakers.

Messemon.name: Messemon
debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Cyber Arena

attacks.name: Messe Stream Attack

Mienumon.name: Mienumon

attacks.name: Stealth Cape

attacks.name: Chameleon Lick
attacks.description: Makes what Montana-chan's tongue touches blended with the environment.

MiniCometmon.name: MiniCometmon
debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters (manga),
"The Devil's Hand!!" [07]
MiniCometmon.description: MiniCometmon appears as a silver comet-shaped spaceship with two silver eyes. It also has two spikes on its bottom front.

Moneymon.name: Moneymon
Moneymon.description: Moneymon appears to be a cross between aslot machineand anautomated teller machinewith itsdollar sign-shaped eyes and nose on the slots. Instead of arms, it has two slot machine levers to act as such. Like most Appmon, it has two cables on its back to allowApplink.

Musclemon.name: Musclemon
Musclemon.description: Musclemon is a Muscle Training Appmon.

Musimon.name: Musimon

attacks.name: Navigation Arrow
attacks.description: Tags targets with navigation pins and attacks with explosive homing arrows.

Offmon.name: Offmon
debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Cyber Arena
Offmon.description: Offmon is an Off Line Appmon.

attacks.name: Switch Lazy
attacks.description: Charges up a small energy orb over a long period of time before firing it off causing a massive explosion when it hits the target.

attacks.name: Tachikiru Link (タチキルリンク, Tachikiru Link lit. "Disconnecting Link")
attacks.description: Creates and launches a small energy ball that suddenly turns into a giant dome that can block off all communications within the area the dome covers.

attacks.description: Summons its trident and jabs it into any nearby piece of ground to send a giant waterspout upwards to drown the enemy. This attack can also break into the AR-Field.

debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Cyber Arena

attacks.name: Eclipse Eraser
attacks.description: Its sword glows red to create an energy ring that surrounds and attacks the enemy.

attacks.name: Reficior (Lat

attacks.name: Twin Scream

attacks.name: Garyousen (臥龍扇, Garyousen lit. "Crouching Dragon Fan")

Setmon.name: Setmon

Shotmon.name: Shotmon
debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Cyber Arena

Shutmon.name: Shutmon
Shutmon.description: Shutmon is a Forced Termination Appmon. It is an Appmon that digivolved from Logomon.

attacks.name: Luna Impulse (Esp: "Moon Impulse")
attacks.description: Shreds the opponent to bits with its scissor blades.

Sleepmon.name: Sleepmon
debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Cyber Arena

Sociamon.name: Sociamon
debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Cyber Arena

Speciamon.name: Speciamon
debut: None

attacks.name: Shippai-shichatta (失敗しちゃった, Shippai-shichatta lit. "Failed")
attacks.description: Says "failed".

Supermon.name: Supermon
debut: None

Swipemon.name: Swipemon
Swipemon.description: Swipemon appears to have a round body with a face on it. It has four pointed legs with no feet. It has a white design above its forehead. Swipemon has two large spikes on both sides of its head. Its color depends on its type.

Tapmon.name: Tapmon
Tapmon.description: Tapmon appear to have small round bodies with four legs with points instead of feat. They have a white design on their foreheads, and a spike on the top of their heads. Tapmon vary in color depending on their type.

Tarotmon.name: Tarotmon
Tarotmon.description: Tarotmon is a Super Fortunetelling Appmon.

attacks.name: Lament Fate
attacks.description: Launches a beam from one of its cards.

Tellermon.name: Tellermon
Tellermon.description: Tellermon is a Fortune Telling Appmon.

Trickmon.name: Trickmon
Trickmon.description: Trickmon appears to be a top hat with arms wearing a mask and bow tie, elements tied to thestage magician. Like most Appmon, it has two cables to allowApplink, though they're stored in the hole on top of its head.

Tripmon.name: Tripmon
debut: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters: Cyber Arena

attacks.name: Iine Rush (いいね ラッシュ, Īne Rasshu, lit. "Nice Rush")
attacks.description: Charges towards the enemy and attacks with a series of multiple "thumbs up" punches whilst constantly shouting "Iine!" (いいね, lit. "Nice!").

Uratekumon.name: Uratekumon

Yadomon.description: Yadomon appears as a hermit crab wearing abellhop's uniform with a hotel as its shell. Like most Appmon, it has two cables to allowApplink, though they're on the back of its shell.
